Class Hangman

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hangman

  • public class Hangman
extends Object
    The hangman class allows to create a basic hangman game by generating a secret word from a predefined word list and uses other methods to guess the word.
    Version:
    1.0 18.02.2017
    Author:
    Bartu Atabek
